name: Zhi-Vago
description: '''Zhi-Vago''' was a German [[dream trance]] music band, produced by Claudio Mangione and Gottfried Engels. Its most successful single was "Celebrate (The Love)", which was a top ten hit in France and Switzerland. The next singles, "Dreamer", was a moderate hit in France, while other ones, including a cover version of [[U2]], passed almost unnoticed.
